title: Home Index File Document
description: Schema describing documents stored in the Meilisearch "files" index.

id.description: xxh64 hexadecimal digest uniquely identifying the file contents

paths.description: Mapping of relative file paths to their modification times (seconds since Unix epoch, truncated to 4 decimal places)

copies.description: Number of entries in the "paths" map

mtime.description: Most recent modification time across all copies (epoch seconds truncated to 4 decimals)

next.description: Name of the next module to process this document or empty string when none
